Plot: When a multimillionaire man's son is kidnapped, he cooperates with the police at first but then turns the tables on the kidnappers when he uses the ransom money as a reward for the capture of the kidnappers.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 3 wins & 4 nominations.
Title: Ransom
Writer: Cyril Hume (story), Richard Maibaum (story), Richard Price (screenplay), Alexander Ignon (screenplay)
Actors: Mel Gibson, Rene Russo, Brawley Nolte, Gary Sinise
